item.description:
@T33J4Y wrote:

I have a dclaws spec but it only hitâ€™s twice and I was wondering how I change it to hit 4 times.
I found this in client java, do I need to change something in here?

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664 && specialAmount > 49){ DDS2Damg = true; DDS2Damg = true; specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 274, 0x426); npcDamage(18); }
